author: craigmcc
msg: Update release notes in preparation for a 1.3 release vote.

author: craigmcc
msg: Fix BeanUtils.populate() so that you can use mapped property selectors in
the keys of the map.  Added JUnit tests to verify correct operation for both
Patch Submitted By:  Miguel Zapaton <commonslist at sslmail.de>

author: craigmcc
msg: Make it possible to specify a default value of null for return on

author: craigmcc
msg: Make BeanUtils.populate() ignore unmatched property names in *all*
circumstances, not just some of them.  :-(.

author: craigmcc
msg: Restore the previous BeanUtils.populate() behavior of simply ignoring property
names in the map that do not exist.  Otherwise, Struts based apps (which use
this to populate the form bean) will have lots of problems.
